metadata.title: CVE-2024-43851 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:soc: xilinx: rename cpu_number1 to dummy_cpu_numberThe per cpu variable cpu_number1 is passed to xlnx_event_handler asargument "dev_id", but it is not used in this function. So drop theinitialization of this variable and rename it to dummy_cpu_number.This patch is to fix the following call trace when the kernel optionCONFIG_DEBUG_ATOMIC_SLEEP is enabled:BUG: sleeping function called from invalid context atinclude/linux/sched/mm.h:274    in_atomic(): 1, irqs_disabled(): 0, non_block: 0, pid: 1, name:swapper/0    preempt_count: 1, expected: 0    CPU: 0 PID: 1 Comm: swapper/0 Not tainted 6.1.0 #53    Hardware name: Xilinx Versal vmk180 Eval board rev1.1 (QSPI) (DT)    Call trace:     dump_backtrace+0xd0/0xe0     show_stack+0x18/0x40     dump_stack_lvl+0x7c/0xa0     dump_stack+0x18/0x34     __might_resched+0x10c/0x140     __might_sleep+0x4c/0xa0     __kmem_cache_alloc_node+0xf4/0x168     kmalloc_trace+0x28/0x38     __request_percpu_irq+0x74/0x138     xlnx_event_manager_probe+0xf8/0x298     platform_probe+0x68/0xd8

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-43851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1030.31~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.10.0-1004.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1007.9~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
